### RequiresExactDefinition {#aaad765d34835c286ef433f03e072d01a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;FunctionAttrs.cpp&#125;::AttributeInferer::InferenceDescriptor::RequiresExactDefinition</>}>
If true, only &quot;exact&quot; definitions can be used to infer this attribute.

See <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#a008adb117253c7a0dde2f796be489d65">GlobalValue::isDefinitionExact</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/functionattrs-cpp/#l01701">1701</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/functionattrs-cpp">FunctionAttrs.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### SkipFunction {#a20a121afceb526fe739e2d647a8b40fa}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::function&lt;bool(const Function &amp;)&gt; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;FunctionAttrs.cpp&#125;::AttributeInferer::InferenceDescriptor::SkipFunction</>}>
Returns true if this function does not have to be handled.

General intent for this predicate is to provide an optimization for functions that do not need this attribute inference at all (say, for functions that already have the attribute).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/functionattrs-cpp/#l01688">1688</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/functionattrs-cpp">FunctionAttrs.cpp</a>.
